segments.text: Oh , I am so tired . My back is sore and my neck hurts .

segments.text: You are wrong , Shirley . I was always absent-minded in the class . I meant to concentrate on the class , but I was just so tired . Maybe I am old .

segments.text: One of my friends took the Adult College Entrance Exam last year . He filled the school column with his name , and his score was relinquished .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How could he make such a silly mistake ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He said he hadn't taken any exams for ten years , and couldn't get used to it immediately . He was extremely nervous then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He lost a very good chance to go to college , didn't he ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . The test was fairly easy and almost every test-taker could pass that exam . Adult College Entrance Exam is much easier than college entrance exam . And there are fewer subjects .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a very good lesson . We must familiarize ourselves with the exam from now on .
